name: 物理光學
description: 本課程銜接第1學期幾何光學課程內容,介紹與建立學生基礎的光學知識，使學生了解物理光學基本原理和應用，並作為未來光學實作與應用之入門工具與知識
goals: 學習如何使用適當的數學工具與圖解瞭解物理光學基本原理和應用
學習如何以文字(書面) (Written) 與口語(Verbal) 描述解說物理光學基本原理和應用
瞭解光學於現代尖端科技所扮演的角色與其貢獻
syllabus:
**3/02 (Mon):**                             

General Introduction & Course Overview (課程簡介與導覽)

From Uniform Circular Motion to Wave Motion

Basic Mathematics of Wave Propagation & EM Wave

EM Wave: Plane Wave, Spherical Wave, and Cylindrical Wave

(波的基本數學與物理)

**3/09 (Mon):**                             

Coherence, Interference of Planewaves, & Dispersion

(同調性、平面波干涉、與色散)

**3/16 (Mon):**                             

Basic Mathematics and Physics of Interference of 2 Planewaves

(兩道平面波干涉的基本數學與物理)

**3/23 (Mon):**                             

**Test (I): 2 hours**

Optical Interferometry, Interferometers, & Selected Applications

(光波干涉學、干涉儀、與其應用)

**3//30 (Mon):**

Optical Diffractions (I): Basic Concepts & Mathematic (繞射的基本原理與數學)

**4/06 (Mon):**

Optical Diffractions (II): Point Spread Function, Diffraction Limited 2-Point Resolution, Diffraction Gratings, & Applications

(繞射極限解析度、繞射光柵、與其應用)

**4/13 (Mon):**     

Polarization Optics (I): Mathematical & Graphical Representations of Polarization States (光波偏振態)

**4/20 (Mon):**

**Midterm Exam: 4 hours**

**4/27 (Mon):**     

Polarization Optics (II): Jones Calculus & Polarizations Transformation

(光波偏振態之調控轉換)

**5/04 (Mon):**

Polarization Optics (III): Applications(光波偏振態的應用)

**5/11 (Mon):**

Gaussian Beam Optics (1): Basic Parameters (高斯光的基本參數)

**5/18 (Mon):**

**Test (II): 2 hours**

Gaussian Beam Optics (1I): Gaussian Transform (高斯光之調控轉換)

**5/25 (Mon):**

Gaussian Beam Optics (1II): Optical Resonator (光波共振腔)

**6/01 (Mon):**

Elementary Laser Theory (I) 雷射原理簡介(I)

**6/08 (Mon):**

Elementary Laser Theory(II) 雷射原理簡介 (II)

**6/15 (Mon):**

**Final Exam: 4 hours**

**Self-Study Lecture Materials for In-class Discussion, and Q&A:**

02/27 to 03/02: 4 hours

06/13 (Sat.), tentative, Final Exam Review and Q&A: 2hours
